lines.text: Find the part you want in Bricksmith
lines.text_raw: Find the part you want in Bricksmith

guide.summary: If you really need a part and need something to hold you over while you wait for your BrickLink order to arrive, you can print your own Lego parts. It's got a lot of steps, and it's complicated and error-prone, but it works for a lot of different parts.
guide.title: Print Your Own Lego Parts
